sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MENU ( MENU_CD, MENU_NM, REG_DTM, UPD_DTM, ORDER_NO ) VALUES ( #menu_cd#, #menu_nm#, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #order_no# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, REG_DTM, UPD_DTM, ORDER_NO FROM MENU ORDER BY MENU_CD ASC

SELECT MENU_CD, MENU_NM, REG_DTM, UPD_DTM, ORDER_NO FROM MENU WHERE 1=1
AND MENU_CD = #menu_cd#
AND MENU_NM = #menu_nm#
ORDER BY MENU_CD DESC LIMIT 1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NM = #menu_nm#, UPD_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), ORDER_NO = #order_no# WHERE MENU_CD=#menu_cd#
